emotions.name: sadness
examples: I cry easier and more often than others.
I usually need a lot of outside help to get motivated.

emotions.name: anger
examples: I tend to raise my voice or even yell at others when things aren't going my way
It's not unusual that I become upset over small things.
Some people would describe me as a ticking time-bomb when it comes to patience.

emotions.name: joy
examples: I am excited about the little things in life.

emotions.name: fear
examples: I am often anxious when I face new challenges.
I feel uneasy a lot without a concrete reason.
I'm scared that I'll never be able to achieve my dreams.

emotions.name: happiness
examples: I'm so happy that I feel like I'm on top of the world.
I am mostly satisfied with how things are and I don't want to change them.
